title: Restoring the United States Department of War
summary: Executive Order 14347, issued on September 5, 2025, directs the restoration of the name 'Department of War' to the United States Department of Defense. The order highlights the historical significance of the name, emphasizing its role in signaling strength and resolve. Key provisions include the authorization of secondary titles like 'Secretary of War' for the Secretary of Defense and the potential renaming of the Department of Defense to the Department of War. The order also outlines implementation steps, including notifications to Congress and recommendations for permanent name changes. The general provisions clarify that the order does not affect existing authorities or create enforceable rights.
